SSRS Developer
Sr.SQL Server BI Developer
SQL Server BI Developer
SQL Server BI Developer
PositionHistory.Description: UnitedHealth Group is a leading health care company, serving more than 75 million people worldwide. Our family of companies touches nearly every aspect of health care, helping people live healthier lives. Provided system support, development and product integration expertise to UHG for the core claim reimbursement system. This system included all aspects of Health Insurance from Member Enrollment, Employer Benefits, Premium Billing and Claims Processing.

PositionHistory.Title: SSIS/SQL Developer
Mentor

Competency.name: A Levels/Grades > Scottish Highers > Scottish Highers management

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a Sr. SQL Server BI Developer/SSRS Developer at Desert Schools Federal Credit Union. This candidate has extensive knowledge of SQL Server Reporting Services, Microsoft SQL Server, SQL Server Integration Services, Microsoft Transact-SQL, SQL Server Analysis Services, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, ETL, Microsoft Excel, Stored Procedures, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, SQL, OLAP Cubes, OLAP, MS-SQLServer 2008R2, Seagate Crystal Reports, Oracle, Microsoft Visual Studio.NET, XML, Microsoft Visual Studio, Microsoft Access, Microsoft ASP.NET, MDX, VBScript, SQL Query Analyzer, OLTP, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, BIDS, Visual Basic .NET, VSS, TOAD, SQL 2008 R2, Performance Point Server, Oracle Report, MySQL, Microsoft office SharePoint, Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Office 2007, Mercury Quality Center, HTML, Framework, Data Mining, DML. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
